name: Farfetch'd
description: The Wild Duck Pokémon. They live where reedy plants grow. Farfetch’d are rarely seen, so it’s thought their numbers are decreasing.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is suffering from a negative status effect or stat change imposed by an opponent, it gains +2 to all attack rolls.
